name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, some netizens discovered that Zhejiang's civil servant internal software "Zhezhengding" actually has a built-in "Youth Date" dating function.
Like most hookup apps in China, this function supports left and right swipes, and can display photos, location, age, height, weight, education, and requirements for a partner.
According to investigations, "Youth Date" is an internal dating project led by the Youth Development Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League.

Recently, netizens have used Li Jiaqi's video of him angrily scolding the audience to create secondary creations to satirize the stock market, housing prices, and the Chinese national football team.

content: On September 18, the German Embassy in China posted a Weibo post explaining why it deleted a comment and once again educating Weibo users about the boundaries of freedom of speech.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 18, the media reported that on the 14th, a student from Hainan Chengmai Middle School jumped to his death because his leave request was not approved.
Before jumping off the building, he called and said "I can't stand it"
After the incident, classmates went to the school's super topic on Weibo to express their condolences.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a campaign of "real-name support for the 8-hour work system" was launched on Douyin. Many workers and laborers held their ID cards and announced that they supported the 8-hour work system with their real names and opposed the 12-hour work system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, a stabbing incident occurred in the dormitory of Sichuan Film and Television Academy Anren Campus

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, Hunan Foreign Language Vocational College was boycotted by netizens because it received Japanese people on that day. The school responded that the incident happened on May 16, not September 18, and the school did not raise the Japanese flag. Someone had maliciously photoshopped the picture, and the police have been notified.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, China decided to provide 30 million RMB in emergency humanitarian aid to Libya's flood disaster. This triggered ridicule from netizens. Netizens asked about the situation of the disaster victims in Zhuozhou and Bobai, Guangxi.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 19, Shanghai Jiaotong University recruited students to serve as "maids" at the Mid-Autumn Festival Garden Party, which aroused students' dissatisfaction and was accused of disrespecting women.
Later, the school changed the recruitment of "maids" to recruiting "Hanfu etiquette".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 19, Sunac filed for bankruptcy protection in the United States

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 19, Southwest University for Nationalities required students to sign a pledge on Internet safety.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 19, a Hangzhou netizen posted that the community had sent a notice to inform people not to hang clothes on the balcony for a week.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the afternoon of September 19, someone wrote "Anti-corruption is always on the way" on the doorplate of the Institute of Medicinal Plants of the China Union Medical College Hospital.
Afterwards, a man was about to jump off the building but was rescued by firefighters.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 19, Pacific Plaza, Yuzhong District, Chongqing
Because the elevator in the community was damaged, the property management refused to repair it on the grounds that they had no money. The owners of the community blocked the entrance of the garage to prevent vehicles from entering and exiting to express their dissatisfaction. During the period, they clashed with the police and some owners were taken away afterwards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The cause was that an elevator in the community was damaged and needed to be replaced. The property management company said that the community overhaul fund had no money to pay for the replacement, but the owners questioned whether the rent of the 26 parking spaces in the community and the rent of the shops in the public area could cover it, and asked the property management company to disclose the public revenue situation over the years.
Figure 1 is a letter of complaint written by the owner representative after the coordination meeting with some owners and the property management company hosted by Shangqingsi Street and Jiaxi Village Community in Yuzhong District, Chongqing City failed.
Figure 2 is the public revenue situation announced by the property management company after repeated requests from the owners, showing that the public revenue is not even enough to cover daily expenses, which has caused dissatisfaction among the majority of owners.
The owners themselves verified that Chongqing Taiguang Property Management Co., Ltd., which has provided property services to the community since its construction in 1995, was originally a property management company under Evergrande Jinbi Property Management. On April 27, 2021, Chongqing California Property Service Co., Ltd. withdrew from Taiguang Property Management, and Chongqing Tongjing Property Management Co., Ltd. officially entered Taiguang Property Management.
Figure 3 is the current shareholding relationship of the property management company obtained through public channels.
The community itself is a commercial and residential building with a large flow of people. After one elevator stopped operating, only one elevator was still in operation. During peak hours, the elevators take a very long time to be in service, and the remaining elevators also have frequent problems during long-term high-intensity operation.
Because the problem has not been solved, the owners of the community gathered in the community garage on September 19, blocking vehicles from entering and exiting to express their dissatisfaction. During the period, they clashed with the police, and some owners were taken away afterwards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 19, a physics teacher found that his social security began to stop paying intermittently, and said that the teachers around him had the same situation.
